snippet.title: Mind Scanners - Deleting Peoples Brains in a Dystopian City
snippet.description:
Mind Scanners Gameplay with Splat! Let's Play Mind Scanners and check out a game where you'll trawl a dystopian city for aberrant behavior and delete the individual's brain, which in retrospect seems like an overreaction. 

Mind Scanners Download : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389550/Mind_Scanners/
